title: louis vuitton monogram vernis totes everythings coming up ikat
text: Louis Vuitton Monogram Vernis Totes: Everythingâ€™s Coming Up Ikat By Tina Craig on  May 24, 2013 2:00 pm  Tina CraigOn the prowl for a chic summer tote? Look no further. Louis Vuitton has come up with the most festive bag of the most carefree season.Â  Inspired by the sun-soaked foliage of the Mediterranean, their Summer 2013 collection is a celebration of blue skies, beaming rays, and unabashed optimism.The freshest interpretation of the collection comes by way of the newest Monogram Vernis tote. A peppy vision has doused their quintessential leather with a gorgeous explosion of abstract print and vivid color. While all the classic Louis Vuitton elements are there â€“ the nude straps, stitched to perfection, and of course, their trademark allover monogram â€“ these painterly blossoms breathe new life into an old faithful. It comes in two styles: the north-south Catalina NS and the east-west Catalina BB, and your choice of two colors, Grand Bleu and Rose Indien.Â Let Louis be the first to remind you this summer: lifeâ€™s too short to not take time and smell the rosesâ€¦or carry a tote that lifts your mood.Catalina BB, $1,700, and Catalina NS, $2,730, at Louis Vuitton.You Will Also Like10 Tips to Get Your Best Skin Ever in 2015The Bag Snob’s Tina Craig Shares Her Ultimate Insider…Summer Beauty Tips for Asian Hair and SkinLouis Vuitton Celebrating Monogram: One, Two, Three, Logo!
